name: playwright_screenshots_trace
description: Screenshots, videos, traces for debugging and test artifacts

args: const { chromium } = require('playwright'); const fs = require('fs'); (async () => { const browser = await chromium.launch(); const page = await browser.newPage(); await page.goto('https://example.com'); await page.screenshot({path: '/tmp/playwright_screenshot.png', fullPage: true}); const stats = fs.statSync('/tmp/playwright_screenshot.png'); console.log('Screenshot:', stats.size, 'bytes'); await browser.close(); })();

expected_output.example:
Screenshot: 32145 bytes

Full page screenshot captured

args: const { chromium } = require('playwright'); (async () => { const browser = await chromium.launch(); const context = await browser.newContext(); await context.tracing.start({screenshots: true, snapshots: true}); const page = await context.newPage(); await page.goto('https://example.com'); await page.click('a'); await context.tracing.stop({path: '/tmp/trace.zip'}); console.log('Trace saved'); await browser.close(); })();

expected_output.example:
Trace saved

Trace file with screenshots and snapshots

args: const { chromium } = require('playwright'); (async () => { const browser = await chromium.launch(); const page = await browser.newPage(); await page.goto('https://example.com'); const pdf = await page.pdf({path: '/tmp/playwright.pdf', format: 'A4'}); console.log('PDF generated'); await browser.close(); })();

expected_output.example:
PDF generated
